nodes.text: This battle droid was stationed on the planet Kiros and participated in the Battle of Kiros.

During the Battle of Kiros, this B1-Series battle droid tried contacting Separatist commander Darts D'Nar to inform him that two Jedi (padawan Ahsoka Tano and Jedi General Anakin Skywalker) are destroying the bombs planted through out the city, but at the time the Zygerrian was fighting High Jedi General Obi-Wan Kenobi, who managed to break the Holoprojector in the fight and the droid's transmission was interrupted. The droid successfully contacted Darts D'Nar later and informed him that the Jedi had already destroyed the two thermal detonator bombs.
The B1 battle droid, like every battle droid in The Clone Wars movie and The Clone Wars TV series, was voiced by Matthew Wood. His name was never given.
